subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The Royal & Ancient and the United States Golf Association announced a rules change Tuesday that will reduce the size and shape of grooves in most clubs in 2010, the first time equipment has been scaled back in nearly 80 years. The change was directed toward elite players and emphasized the importance of hitting the ball in the fairway.
